**VCM Periscopes Project**

**Reference Number:** PW-VCM-004-28896

**Tender Closing Date:** February 6, 2023, 14:00:00

**Publication Date:** December 21, 2022

**Contracting Agency:** Public Works and Government Services Canada

**End User:** Department of National Defence

**Contact Person:** Kirby Dawson (Kirby.Dawson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Project Description:**

The Victoria-Class Modernization Periscopes Project is a procurement request for the modernization of periscopes used in submarines. This project falls under the category of Goods and Services, with a specific NSIC (North American Industry Classification System) code of *N1905C* corresponding to "Submarines".

**Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Tender Description:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bidders to participate in the Victoria-Class Modernization Periscopes Project (RFP # W8472-195765/C). The tender is open to all interested suppliers and requires the submission of a bid.

**Industrial and Technological Benefits Policy:**

As per the Industrial and Technological Benefits Policy, this project requires innovative solutions that meet the Industrial and Technological Benefits policy requirements. The proposing companies are encouraged to demonstrate their value proposition and how they will meet the requirements of this policy.
